tool_description: Extract Entities, PII, Sentiment, Keywords and Summary from text.
name: Jibber Analyzer
title: Jibber Analyzer

api_list.name: Analyze (Spanish)
api_list.description: Analyzes text for entities, pii, keywords and summary.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jibber-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/es/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jibber-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
